about_the_game:
"In an abandoned kingdom scarred by darkness, a broken knight must fight to protect his world."

Three Potions is a 2D action-platformer adventure with aggressive fast-paced combat and an engaging storyline.

In Three Potions, a knight named Kal awakens to protect the empty kingdom of Heartfall. Evil has been lurking, and Kal must travel far to the east, facing harrowing dangers, and a regretful past.

Battle against fearsome warriors, mages, and forces of binding darkness. Uncover the sorrowful history of Heartfall. Discover if it's truly possible to change.

  • Beautiful Environments and Visual Effects

  • Intense mission-based gameplay

  • Challenging Boss Battles

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 1.3GHz or more, 64-bit
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB display memory
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12+ running on workstation and laptop form factors, without emulation or compatibility layer.
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers.
